original_text: Some men from Ziph went to visit Saul at Gibeah. They said to him, ‘David is hiding on Hakilah hill, which is across the valley from Jeshimon.’ Samuel 25 Samuel 27
korean_text: 십 사람이 기브아에 와서 사울에게 말하여 이르되 다윗이 광야 앞 하길라 산에 숨지 아니하였나이까 하매

sentences.original_text: Some men from Ziph went to visit Saul
sentences.korean_translation: 십에서 온 몇 사람들이 사울을 만나러 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: which is across the valley from Jeshimon'
